title: The big questions of the Holocaust
itunes:title: The big questions of the Holocaust
itunes:subtitle: Historian, author and broadcaster Laurence Rees joins us to discuss his upcoming book The Holocaust: A New History and consider some of the key debates in the history of the Nazi genocide of the Jews  See acast.com/privacy for privacy and...
description:
Historian, author and broadcaster Laurence Rees joins us to discuss his upcoming book The Holocaust: A New History and consider some of the key debates in the history of the Nazi genocide of the Jews

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
